main.name: Tim Dillon
main.description: I recently graduated from Western Governors University in the US with a Bachelors of Science in Software Development.
main.bio: The majority of my experience so far has been with Java, making Java desktop apps with JavaFX. I also have some experience using Spring Boot for Java web apps. I am most interested in growing as a backend developer, creating web apps and microservices, but I'm always open to new adventures. When I'm not coding I play soccer, go mountain climbing, or play with my 2 dogs.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me and connect

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Software Development
education.description: Took classes in software development, design and testing. Coursework also include database management, networking and project management.

work.title: LQA Tester
work.description: Tested video games for bugs, reported testing results and bugs to clients. Performed regression testing on bug fixes.

work.title: Route Manager
work.description: Managed delivery, sales and merchandising for a Pepsi route covering 4 cities. Led a team of 3 to grow route sales and build positive customer relationships.

work.title: Health Unit Coordinator
work.description: Provided patient care and logistical services for a healthcare system of four hospitals and numerous outpatient clinics and labs. Provided technical support and training for staff during EPIC EMR deployment.

projects.title: Grocery List
projects.category: Grocery list app made with React and Spring Boot
